mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Raines, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Roane Co., W VA [Roane County, West Virginia]
Spencer, Roane Co., VA [Spencer, Roane County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Raines, George Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture of left shoulder. Conical bullet entered at the articulation of the clavical [clavicle] with the aecromian [acromion] process of the scapula passing obliquely backward and inwards to lodge near the spinal column between the spinous process of the 7 cervical and 1 dorsal vertabrae . Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/09/19. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Furloughed 1864/12/13. Returned to duty .
